backgammon.game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • backgammon.game.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Player. the base class for players and contains code that only covers human players. two players will always be made, the AI will extend this to use AIPlayers though
    Author:
    David Lomas - 11035527
